channel.title: Boozing & Bonding
channel.description: Two friends (Keegan and Chris) rewatch every James Bond film and pair it with a delectable alcoholic beverage themed around the film they're watching. They watch the movie, drink, and then things get sloppy.
channel.copyright: © 2019 Boozing & Bonding. Part of the Station Zed Empire.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The alcohol-fueled James Bond retrospective podcast.
channel.itunes:author: Station Zed
channel.itunes:summary: Two friends (Keegan and Chris) rewatch every James Bond film and pair it with a delectable alcoholic beverage themed around the film they're watching. They watch the movie, drink, and then things get sloppy.
channel.googleplay:author: Station Zed
channel.googleplay:description: Two friends (Keegan and Chris) rewatch every James Bond film and pair it with a delectable alcoholic beverage themed around the film they're watching. They watch the movie, drink, and then things get sloppy.

item.title: Book Club 003 – Casino Royale (Novel)
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
We go back to the start of the primordial ooze from which the entire James Bond franchise springs forth from. And what an ooze it is! Not only do we discuss the original Casino Royale novel, but we also talk about Ian Flemming and his issues, which bleeds into the issues we have with Bond’s premiere. Spoiler alert: we find it rough. How rough?? We felt the need for a special trigger warning for this one. That’s how rough.

Trigger Warning: a more in-depth discussion about misogyny, violence against women and sexual assault than our usual episodes.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com

item.title: Book Club 002 – Eidolon
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
We return to the world of Dynamite Comics’ ultra violent James Bond for its second story arc: Eidolon. Do we enjoy this more than the previous Bond comic outing, or does it not stand a GHOST of a chance? Listen to find out!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com
item.itunes:subtitle: We return to the world of Dynamite Comics’ ultra violent James Bond for its second story arc: Eidolon. Do we enjoy this more than the previous Bond comic outing, or does it not stand a GHOST of a chance? Listen to find out! — Hosted by Chris Nyarad

item.title: Book Club 001 – VARGR
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description: In our first Boozing & Bonding Book Club special, we take a look at the first James Bond comic book arc produced by Dynamite Comics: VARGR. Do we have a bloody good time or a bloody bad time? Either way, it’s very bloody.

item.title: S-Branch 009 – Daily Double Oh Seven
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
Keegan prepares a Jeopardy-style James Bond quiz for Chris! Can YOU get a higher score than him? (You probably can!)

—

item.title: S-Branch 008 – Sean Conplicated
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
With the news of the passing of Sean Connery, we take a moment to look back at the troubled life, and career of the legendary Bond actor. Plus, we head back to Las Vegas to bring you bonus content from our Diamond Are Forever episode.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com
item.itunes:subtitle: With the news of the passing of Sean Connery, we take a moment to look back at the troubled life, and career of the legendary Bond actor. Plus, we head back to Las Vegas to bring you bonus content from our Diamond Are Forever episode. — Hosted by Chris N

item.title: S-Branch 007 – Making Time for No Time to Die
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
With the news that No Time to Die has been delayed (for the second time) Keegan and Chris take a moment to actually talk about their thoughts on Daniel Craig’s overdue upcoming Bond finale, as well as it’s troubling journey to actually be shown to the public during a global pandemic. As if that topic isn’t fun enough, we also play 2 Bond-themed games: a return to Mad-Libs and a horrible Bond movie review quiz!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com

item.title: 0013 – Octopussy
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
At long last, we return to the world on James Bond! And boy are we cranky, boarding on nihilistic, as we watch “Octopussy” (1983). How can the Boozing & Bonding Boys get mad at a film where James Bond dresses as a clown, gorilla, crocodile, and a horse’s ass?! Grab yourself a Chai Martini, touch some Fabergé eggs, and join us to find out! #ElephantsNeverForget

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com
Drinks sponsored by Sons of Vancouver Distillery (Check them out at https://sonsofvancouver.ca/)

item.title: S-Branch 006 – Oops! All Games
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
Let’s just have fun, you guys!! In this episode, Keegan and Chris just wind back playin’ some games with the vague reoccurring theme of James Bond tying it all together. First, we play a round of Mad Libs with fan-submitted suggestions, and then things get wild as we let an AI-complete James Bond fan fiction with us. Things get wild, y’all.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com

item.title: S-Branch 005 – Second Chances (Brought to you by WikiFeet)
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description: Keegan and Chris return to talk about what James Bond films we’d like to be seen in a remake or reboot. Then we head back to Japan for cut content from You Only Live Twice, where foot fetishes are mentioned a lot. Chris is as confused as you are.
item.itunes:subtitle: Keegan and Chris return to talk about what James Bond films we’d like to be seen in a remake or reboot. Then we head back to Japan for cut content from You Only Live Twice, where foot fetishes are mentioned a lot. Chris is as confused as you are.

item.title: S-Branch 004 – You Only Live and Let Die Twice (ft. Lindsay Braynen)
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description: We’re joined by our first ever guest and friend of the show Lindsay Braynen (heymagicalgirl.com) as we dive in-depth back into the crocodile-infested waters of Live and Let Die to talk about the representation of Voodoo and black culture in this film, and so much more! We also play a game of mad-libs (unrelated.)

item.itunes:keywords: BoozeBondPod,Boozing and Bonding,Chris Nyarady,Ian Flemming,James Bond,James Bond 007,Keegan Flick-Parker,Lindsay Braynen,Live and Let DIe,Roger Moore,Voodoo

item.title: S-Branch 003 – We Jumped the Shark
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description: In our return to S-Branch, Keegan and Chris pitch hypothetical actors they’d want to see in the future of the Bond franchise. Some are jokes, some are serious, most of them are jumping the shark. Speaking of sharks, we return to our shark-filled episode of Thunderball for more bonus content!

item.title: S-Branch 002 – Santa Bond
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description: It’s the long-delayed return of our sober sister podcast: S-Branch! Speaking of long-delayed, Chris gives Keegan an out of season Christmas gift, and we revisit cut content from our Goldfinger episode.

item.title: 0012 – For Your Eyes Only
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
While enjoying some warm glühwein (mulled wine) the Boozing & Bonding Boys make a startling discovery: it’s harder to pay attention to serious movies when you’re drunk. Listen as they struggle to recall the plot of the (comparatively) grounded Bond film “For Your Eyes Only” (1981). Enjoy the good, the bad, and the uncomfortable in this retrospective Bond outing, that looks back on the past and paves the way for the rest of Bond’s films to come.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

item.title: 0011 – Moonraker
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
Pack your bags folks! It’s time to blast off with Roger Moore’s 1979 Bond film Moonraker!! So grab your Tang and vodka, and get Astro-drunk with Keegan and Chris as they navigate the most cartoony of Bond’s outings. It’s a film where laser fights fit right in with a hovercraft gondola, a double-taking pigeon, and the most farfetched thing, love at first sight. Also, Jaws is back! Yay!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

item.title: 0010 – The Spy Who Loved Me
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
Return with Roger Moore’s James Bond (or Mr Bund as some know him) for his 1977 film: The Spy Who Loved Me. A film where things seem familiar… maybe too familiar. Sharks, nukes, and Russians? Check, check and check! Join Keegan and Chris as they get tipsy on Moscow mules and become a pair of rude, rude boys this episode. Also, Jaws might be a vampire! Find out why by listening to the episode! *CHOMP*

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

item.itunes:keywords: BoozeBondPod,James Bond,Moscow Mule,Podcast,Roger Moore,spy,The Spy Who Loved Me

item.title: 009 – The Man with the Golden Gun
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
Roger Moore returns, and his Bond is at peak asshole in the 1974 film The Man with the Golden Gun! Listen as we gush about Christopher Lee, be charmed by Nick Nack, be confused about the film’s Asian representation, and rage over a poorly placed slide whistle. A couple of tropical “Golden Gun” cocktails help us take both good and the bad, so join us for the ups and downs of this perfectly serviceable film.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

item.title: 008 – Live and Let Die
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
We’re back with season 2: The Roger Moore Era!! Keegan and Chris head down to New Orleans, sippin’ sazeracs, and watching the funky fresh (and a bit funky stale) 1973 film Live and Let Die. Enjoy crocodiles, massive boat chases, a kick-ass theme song, and problematic depictions of black characters and culture. This film has it all!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

item.title: The Bondies (Season 1 Finale)
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
For the final episode of our first season, we do something a little different. We make an award show!! It’s the perfect way to look back at all the films, and drinks we’ve enjoyed so far. We decide the victors in numerous categories, along with some help from our listeners. All while “enjoying” classic vodka martinis (and a bunch of olives.)

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com

It’s the perfect way to look back at all the films, and drinks we’ve enjoyed so far. We decide the victors in numerous categories, along with some help from our listeners. All while “enjoying” classic vodka martinis (and a bunch of olives.) — Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker Edited by Chris Nyarady Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com) Website: www.boozingandbonding.com

item.title: S-Branch 001 – We’re Sober Now!
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
In our first episode of S-Branch (the sober sister podcasts to Boozing & Bonding), Chris has some lingering thoughts about Goldfinger, and the boys actually finally make rules for their James Bond drinking game.

Also, vote for who you want to win in our season 1 award show episode: The Bondies
www.boozingandbonding.com/bondies-survey.html

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker

item.title: 007 – Diamonds Are Forever
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
Time to play a little game called “where are the frickin’ diamonds?!” We bid farewell to Sean Connery in perhaps the most polarizing film we’ve explored yet: the silly Las Vagas romp known as Diamonds Are Forever. And we cheer Sean Connery’s goodbye from the show with a Black Velvet cocktail.

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com

item.title: 006 (Part 2) – On Her Majesty’s Secret Service
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
George Lazenby might be a one-and-done Bond, but we’re not done talking about this movie! It’s the exciting conclusion to our 2 part “On Her Majesty’s Secret Service” epic! What did we think about this all-new, all-different Bond movie? And about the film’s controversial ending? We slam back another Tim Tam Slam and talk all about it!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

item.title: 006 (Part 1) – On Her Majesty’s Secret Service
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
George Lazenby takes over the role of Bond, and we have so much to talk about! So much in fact, that this is our first two-part episode! So join us in part 1 of our discussion of “On Her Majesty’s Secret Service” where we disagree on the film’s music, agree on how awesome the Bond girl Tracy is, and we cozy up with some boozy hot chocolates and coffees as Keegan teaches Chris the finer points of a Tim Tam Slam.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

item.itunes:keywords: BoozeBondPod,Chris Nyarady,George Lazenby,James Bond,Keegan Flick-P,Keegan Flick-Parker,On Her Majesty's Secret Service,Tim Tam Slam,Tim Tim

item.title: 005 – You Only Live Twice
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
We share some sake and journey to the land of the rising sun for the mixed-bag Bond film known as You Only Live Twice. Take joy in a tiny helicopter, cringe at outdated stereotypes, cheer for The Rock’s grandfather, be confused at the choice of trying to make Sean Connery look like a Japanese man. This episode has it all!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

item.title: 004 – Thunderball
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
We jump into some familiar waters as we watch Thunderball and drink the rum-based cocktail known as “Sharkbite.” The movie recap gets incredibly sloppy as our drunken ramblings find it difficult to separate this film from Never Say Never Again, and we pitch some new James Bond spin-off movies. 4 episodes in, and we’re already jumping the shark?? Join us to find out!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

item.title: 003 – Goldfinger
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
We sip on mint juleps as we watch Goldfinger. In this episode Goldfinger talks about how much he loves gold, Chris talks about how much he loves Oddjob, we all giggle at Pussy Galore’s name, and Keegan pitches some better, slightly less sexist one-liners for Bond. Join us for one of our favorite Bond films paired with (so far) our least favorite drink.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

item.title: 002 – From Russia With Love
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
Our second outing with Sean Connery as Bond leads to a surprisingly emotional journey and the first #TrainFight of many to come. Join us as we watch what many folks say is their favorite Bond film, From Russia With Love, while we drink the most obvious drink we could pair with this movie: White Russians.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

item.title: 001 – Dr. No
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
We go back to where it all started with the first James Bond film, Dr. No, while enjoying a delicious mango rum cocktail. Oh ya, and there’s also a dragon. That’s in there too.
All this and more on Boozing & Bonding!

—

item.title: 000 – Never Say Never Again
item.dc:creator: Boozing & Bonding
item.description:
In our debut episode, Sean Connery goes back on his word in the film Never Say Never Again. Meanwhile, Chris and Keegan exchange regrettable drinks from their pasts.

—
